import './DetailsModal.css'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; function DetailsModal({transaction,closeDetails, editTransaction, isNewItem, addTransaction}) { const [editedTransaction, setEditTransaction] = useState(transaction); function handleChange(ev,key){ let editedTransactionCopy = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(editedTransaction)); editedTransactionCopy[key] = ev.target.value; setEditTransaction(editedTransactionCopy); } function saveChanges(){ console.log(isNewItem) //isNewItem ? addTransaction(editedTransaction) : editTransaction(editedTransaction); } return (
Transaction details
); } export default DetailsModal;
